topics.body:
I think I have been convinced by "Basic Income":http://www.reddit.com/r/BasicIncome/wiki/index#wiki_that.27s_all_very_well.2C_but_where.27s_the_evidence.3F

It certainly makes more sense to indiscriminately subsidize people for living when welfare does the same function but is full of bureaucrats.
Keeps market incentives intact as well. 

Just cut a check and be done with it. America used to do this, more or less, under an older tax code. But years of changing politics did away with that. But I am not sure.
